title: Why do the ongoing download tasks over a Wi-Fi network stop after the screen turns off?
answer:
Check whether you have modified the settings for **Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep**.** **The default value is **Always** (download tasks will not stop when the screen turns off). If you select **Only when plugged in** or **Never**, the Wi-Fi network will disconnect when the screen turns off, and the ongoing download tasks will stop.

1. Touch **Advanced settings** 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151019113020503001.png)

2.  On the screen, touch **Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep** and select **Always**.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151019113110964001.png)
